segments.text: Steven , have you ever met Hanson ever since he went back to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but we still stay in touch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the way you keep in contact ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Email is not always the best form . I think QQ is way better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your words sound a bit reasonable . But don â€™ t forget the time difference .
segments.speaker: S2
